name: Rhythm Soccer
description: Step into the world of rhythm football and play with your favorite teams from Brazil, Argentina, Italy, and Germany! This amazing rhythm game is all about timing - hit the notes perfectly to pass the ball and score a goal. The cartoonish visuals add a fun twist to the gameplay, and the 15 manually synchronized songs will keep you entertained for hours. You can play friendly matches or compete in a tournament to become the ultimate rhythm football champion. This game was made with a lot of love by a solo developer and is now available on Steam. Download now and experience the excitement of rhythm football!
